title: Adani Group to supply clean energy for Google's India cloud operations
description: Adani Group will provide clean energy for Google's cloud services and operations in India, using electricity from a new solar-wind hybrid project at its 30 gigawatt Khavda renewable energy park in Gujarat. The project is set to begin commercial operations in the third quarter of 2025.
